::Najah::

Najah blinked and say:
"Just shoot him!!! I'll bite him If I hav=
e a chance... But if the big-l says  "Shot" is shot"

And Najah transformed=
 at robot mode and show his plasma gun towards his enemy.
  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: =
Tuesday, October 17, 2000 6:47 PM
  Subject: Re: Firing all on one bot...

=

  ::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer/WarMachine::

  One of the sho=
ts from the big autogun heads for Zardus. Not enough time to 
  dive under =
it, the Alliance commander puts up his hands to block the shot, 
  his laun=
cher overloading and shutting down.

  Calmly, he replaces his broken weapo=
n with an automatic rifle, firing two 
  dozen bolts at the big autogun.
  =
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Two missiles hit trees near Bloodystrike, the All=
iance bot diving for cover. 
  He looks at Sharpedge through the foliage, f=
iring a missile at the bot.

  One missile left in the missile launcher, Bl=
oodystrike puts it away, taking 
  out his rifle.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=

  Reptilica flies upward, a few optic shots hitting his legs but the major=
ity 
  of the firepower passing under him.

  He turns to look at Jetstorm,=
 firing two missiles at the bot.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  DevilDuer emer=
ges from the forest at the Alliance base, looking around.

  "Hey," he says=
, walking up to Serpentor, Nemesis, and Scattershot, "There's 
  still a ba=
ttle goin' on at those guys' base. If yer not too damaged, you can 
  help.=
 Zardus asked me to clean up here, though."

  He turns his head, looking a=
t Vampra's body on the ground. Walking over to 
  her, he picks her up, ent=
ering the base and heading toward the CR chambers.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~
  WarMachine flinched as Mobster's shots dug into him, leaving scorch mar=
ks. He 
  was starting to lose mechfluid at a fast rate, as well as quickly=
 running low 
  on energy.

  Aiming his gun at the bot's chest, he pulls t=
he trigger, a couple of missiles 
  along with alot of plasma shots streami=
ng out toward the enemy gestalt's 
  chest.

        eGroups Sponsor 
     =
